
   a..z A .. Z 0.. 9 
   many times a..z A..Z 0..9 _

   state eps      other transitions, interval based
   1:    { }    a/1  z+1/error  A/1 (Z+1)/error 0/1 (9+1)/ error 
   2:    {1}    a/0  z+1/error  A/0 (Z+1)/error 0/0 (9+1)/error _/0 _+1/error

   while  :reads while

    if you enter while into the trie, you have to put behind it,
    everything that would cannot be an identifier.
